name: CUBEBOY+
description:
New Levels. New Design. New Ending.

CUBEBOY+ is an updated version of the original CUBEBOY, making it more polished and giving it more content.

(The original is still up on my scratch page, in case this one doesn't run very well on your PC.)

Controls:

Jump - W

Left - A

Right - D

These controls can be modified in the settings.

UPDATES:

v2.0: CUBEBOY+ Released
